mean_cn: n. （旧病的）复发，重陷，回复；  vi. 重新陷入，回复
mean_en: the return of an illness after a period of improvement
word_etyma: re再+lapse滑,滑走→一再滑下去→再次犯病等 → （病）复发；（罪）累犯
short_phrase: get sick again and suffer a relapse
sentence: I'm afraid I relapsed. I've started smoking again.
sentence_trans: 恐怕我是故态复萌，又开始抽烟了。
